content: lion brand pattern # 50775-1 50775-2 *chs-shrug pdf* corrections applied jan 26 2006 skill level advanced beginner size medium large s/m l finished width 54 57 / 137 145 cm including cuffs length 12 14 / 30 5 35 5 cm #790 homespun 2 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge 11 sts + 8 row = 4 10 cm in single_crochet chain 1 pattern on larger hook shrug is crocheted in one piece beginning at lower edge cuffs are crocheted separately and sewn on after shrug is completed also available st lion brand as easy homespun shrug 1 on joann com #p448336 simple shrug 2 1 http //www lionbrand com/crochet-easy-homespun-shrug-50775-1 html 2 http //www joann com/simple-shrug/p448336 html
